buildCommand: npm install && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('./public/swagger.json', JSON.stringify(require('swagger-jsdoc')({ definition: { openapi: '3.0.0', info: { title: 'Mini CS50x Answer API', version: '1.0.0', description: 'API for submitting answers and retrieving rankings for the ISPH Mini CS50x competition.' } }, apis: ['./controllers/*.js'] }))) && npm run build"
